page.title: 19POLICE AT PARKWOOD
page.content: P.C.Navaro is a local policeman. He rides a bicycle so that he can talk to people more easily and they to him. He has been in the police force for over 7{years and in Maidstone for 4 years. {He patrols all of Parkwood and has {arrested over 100 people there. He {says that, being a community {policeman, he can be called on at any {time of the day or night. The 12-week {training, he adds, was very hard, both {physically and mentally. Next to the West Kent Police HQ on the Sutton Road is an estate of houses originally built for the police. Many now prefer to buy their own houses, however, so the empty ones are let to KCC employees while they are looking for accommodation. Nearby are garages for the repair of police vehicles, and a centre, complete with skid pan, for the training of police drivers.
